HomePage.location: Based in Borno State, Nigeria. NG
HomePage.resume: A skilled full-stack developer with a strong foundation in TypeScript, React, and blockchain technology. I create secure, scalable, and high-performance web and mobile applications, ensuring seamless user experiences. Passionate about problem-solving and delivering innovative digital solutions.

services.title: Services
services.sub_title: I'm a full-stack developer specializing in building high-performance web and mobile applications for brands, companies, institutions, and startups. I focus on delivering strategic, scalable, and secure digital solutions tailored to your needs.

cta.title: Let's Build Something Great!
cta.sub_title: I'm available for freelance projects. Whether you need a web or mobile solution, let's collaborate to bring your vision to life. Get in touch, and let's create something amazing together!

resume.paragraf_1: Hey there! Thanks for stopping by my personal website. I'm a full-stack developer with a passion for building secure, scalable, and high-performance web and mobile applications. With expertise in TypeScript, React, Next.js, and blockchain development, I thrive on solving complex problems and delivering seamless user experiences.
resume.paragraf_2: I specialize in creating innovative digital solutions that are both functional and user-friendly. My tech stack includes JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js, and Express.js, along with experience in real-time systems, NFC payments, and blockchain integration. As an adaptable and quick learner, I embrace new challenges and continuously refine my skills to stay ahead in the ever-evolving tech landscape.
resume.paragraf_3: Collaboration and communication are key to my work. I enjoy working with teams, contributing my expertise, and learning from others. My problem-solving mindset and leadership abilities allow me to navigate complex projects efficiently. If you are looking for a developer to bring your ideas to life, let's connect and create something amazing together!

responsibilities.responsibility_1: Developed and maintained the backend systems for a land rental and purchase platform using Node.js and Express.js, ensuring secure and efficient handling of transactions.
responsibilities.responsibility_2: Worked with databases like MongoDB and SQL to manage real estate listings, user profiles, and transaction records.
responsibilities.responsibility_3: Integrated third-party APIs for payment processing and geolocation services, allowing users to complete land purchases and rentals seamlessly.
responsibilities.responsibility_4: Implemented role-based access control (RBAC) for different user roles (admin, buyer, seller) to ensure appropriate access to resources.
responsibilities.responsibility_5: Optimized database queries and API routes for scalability and performance, ensuring the backend could handle increasing traffic and complex queries.
responsibilities.responsibility_6: Collaborated with the frontend team to integrate real-time data updates and user actions for a smooth user experience.

responsibilities.responsibility_1: Developed and maintained frontend and backend code using Next.js, Privy.io, and Vercel for seamless integration and deployment.
responsibilities.responsibility_2: Implemented secure user authentication and payment gateway integrations using Privy.io and other tools.
responsibilities.responsibility_3: Collaborated remotely with a cross-functional team to build and deploy features for clients, following Agile development methodologies.
responsibilities.responsibility_4: Ensured project deadlines were met while maintaining a high level of code quality and performance.
